price: Èyin ènìyàn, ìṣítí kan láti ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa yín ti dé ba yín. Ìwòsàn ni fún n̄ǹkan tó wà nínú àwọn igbá-àyà ẹ̀dá. Ìmọ̀nà àti ìkẹ́ ni fún àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكُم مَّوۡعِظَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَشِفَآءٞ لِّمَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu qad jāatkum mawʿiẓatun min rabbikum washifāon limā fī al-ṣudūri wahudan waraḥmatun lil'mu'minīna
